25 Global strategy affects local. Same economic plan. posted 9 hours ago by LibsRTards 3 comments award share download report block
3 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Apersonofinterest 2 points 9 hours ago I've noticed prices on most basic staples have come down. Milk, eggs, butter, cheese, some meats but not beef. Gas is still $5 because I live in LA. Fast food prices have also been coming down. permalink award report block reply Stlpoolguy 2 points 8 hours ago Gas $2.46, eggs $1.95 here permalink award report block reply schiff_for_brains 2 points 9 hours ago Bananas are easy to get under $0.60/lb, and I just paid $1.99 for 18 eggs.  Gas is a bit more than this, but my shitty blue state has a tax that changes with inflation. permalink award report block reply
Apersonofinterest 2 points 9 hours ago I've noticed prices on most basic staples have come down. Milk, eggs, butter, cheese, some meats but not beef. Gas is still $5 because I live in LA. Fast food prices have also been coming down. permalink award report block reply
